entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Campbell River Airport 9:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
